column4: im having issue mounting a dvd on a laptop, Im 100% sure ive set the correct line in /etc/fstab but it still keeps repeating "mount: no medium found on /dev/sr0" Ive browsed UbuntuForums and have not gotten very far with my issue (ver 10.10)
Woudnt the packages like libreaddvd4 work for that copy protection?
you mentioned copy protection, is there no way to mount a DVD in ubuntu 10.10? I know it'll take a data disc, just refuses to see any storebought DVDs
